description:
Unlike the name suggests, this is not a canyon but rather an open gorge with 3 abseils. I would not recommend this trip unless you enjoy lots of uphill and downhill along the QLD/NSW border track.

Approach

TIP 01: Take mountain bikes. TIP 02: Take electric mountain bikes

This trip is for those who enjoy lots of uphill and downhill along the QLD/NSW border track.

Park at the border crossing along Lions Road. Head uphill along the border and follow that for 4-5 hours.

Descent

Do the 3 abseils

Exit

Return along the border.

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

https://www.theverticaladventurer.com/single-post/Canyon-Curiosity-A-Canyoning-Adventure

Background
name: Long Creek
